name: Daifen
description:
Daifen is an story based infinity runner ambiented in the underworld, where you, an eye, have been trapped because of unknown reasons.. will you be  capable to escape?

Actually this is the first game I've ever made and is under developement,  it's currently on the pre-alpha version where is playable but still doesn't have the story and other characteristics that I want to add.

If you want to play it you're free to do it and i would be so grateful, but again, it is in a very primitive version where the only thing you can do is to beat your record.

IF YOU DOWNLOAD IT SHARE YOUR HIGHSCORES!!

NEW IN THE 0.2 VERSION:

- Velocity has been reduced in the player movement.

- New difficulty increasement, every time the character's speed increases little by little until certain quantity.

IF YOU FIND A GLITCH OR SOMETHING THAT IS WRONG IN THE GAME PLEASE COMMENT AND LET ME KNOW, I'LL DO MY BEST TO FIX IT!!
